name: Skopje Code
description: A hackathon is an intense, collaborative event where participants come together to innovate, solve problems, and build projects in a limited amount of time—usually 24 to 48 hours. It brings together developers, designers, entrepreneurs, and tech enthusiasts to brainstorm ideas and turn them into functioning prototypes or solutions.

name: TechChallenge 2025
description: An exciting hackathon where participants will focus on building AI-powered solutions for the future of digital communication. Teams will work with cutting-edge technologies to innovate for industries like healthcare, finance, and customer service.

name: CodeSprint 2025
description: A fast-paced hackathon focusing on building scalable and efficient web applications. Developers and designers will collaborate to create innovative solutions using the latest frameworks and technologies, all within a tight deadline.

name: Mobile Dev Hackathon
description: A hackathon for mobile app developers where participants will build innovative, functional, and user-friendly mobile apps. Developers will have the opportunity to collaborate, build their portfolios, and showcase their app development skills.

name: AI Innovation Hackathon
description: An event focused on building cutting-edge AI solutions for real-world problems, including automation, natural language processing, and predictive analytics. Teams will work with the latest AI tools and platforms to push the limits of artificial intelligence.

name: Blockchain Challenge 2025
description: A hackathon focused on the future of blockchain technology. Participants will create decentralized applications (DApps), smart contracts, and solutions leveraging blockchain for various use cases including finance, supply chain, and healthcare.

name: Innovation Hackathon 2025
description: A hackathon designed for students and professionals to innovate, collaborate, and create solutions for challenges faced by industries such as education, healthcare, and the environment. A space to push the boundaries of what's possible with technology.

name: FutureTech Hackathon 2025
description: A hackathon focusing on the future of technology and how it can be applied to create smart cities, advanced transportation solutions, and sustainable energy systems. Participants will innovate using IoT, AI, and renewable energy tech.
